name: Good Boy Berliner
description: Award-winning sour beer. Pale, straw-colored. Tart, light, crushable beer that presents with dough and lemon on the nose. Softly rolls over the tongue with tang and effervescence. Leaves grainy wheat on your breath.

name: Summer Hours
description: A variety of hops blend to create a unique aroma and flavor full of light herbal and fruit notes. Leaves more than enough room for the delicious crackery taste that every pilsner should have.

yeast: SafLager W-34/70 German Lager Dry Yeast

name: Strawberry Mango Berliner
description: The addition of strawberries and mangos to our classic Good Boy Berliner creates the perfect summer beer. Even folks who avoid sours or beer entirely may find themselves enjoying this one.

name: Blackberry Berliner
description: Good Boy Berliner fermented on blackberries. The dark and sweet fruit adds another dimension of tartness beyond that of Good Boy. After each sip, the blackberry makes way for the signature grainy breath of the beer underneath.

name: Amber Lager
description: Malty, clean amber lager. Brewed with german malts.

name: English Bitter
description: A simple beer that puts English malts on display.

name: Raspberry Wheating
description: If you like fruit, you'll love this. Every gallon of beer is made with at least 1 lb of raspberries. The underlying American Wheat brew provides a fluffy canvas for the raspberry to express itself.
